name: reaper-market
description: Reaper Market - Premium Marketplace for Digital Assets

scripts.build: npm ci --only=production && cd client && npm ci --only=production && npm run build
scripts.build:netlify: npm install --prefer-offline --no-optional --no-audit --no-fund --cache .npm-cache && cd client && npm install --prefer-offline --no-optional --no-audit --no-fund --cache ../.npm-cache && npm run build
scripts.build:netlify:fallback: npm install --prefer-offline --no-optional --no-audit --no-fund && cd client && npm install --prefer-offline --no-optional --no-audit --no-fund && npm run build
scripts.build:netlify:simple: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.setup: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.build:netlify:ps: npm install --prefer-offline --no-optional --no-audit --no-fund --cache .npm-cache; cd client; npm install --prefer-offline --no-optional --no-audit --no-fund --cache ../.npm-cache; npm run build

author: Reaper Market
